entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 12 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain late this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to 12 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 10:46 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
